p: The thermogravimetry/differential thermal analysis (TG–DSC) curves for the Rb 3Na(H 2C 3N 3O 3) 4·3H 2O crystal were recorded with a NETZSCH STA 449C simultaneous thermal analyzer. The sample was placed in an Al 2O 3 crucible and heated at a rate of 10 °C/min in the range of 25–800 °C under inflowing nitrogen gas.
